backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile storage with access control for viewing and saving profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement asserting components using useBranchAuth must be wrapped in BranchAuthProvider.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing many frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables for light/dark themes and applying global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML bootstrapping the React app by loading main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component with authentication gating, view mode switching, print view handling, and provider setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Login gate page offering branch login and Internet Identity login options with branding layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch username/password login form that calls useBranchAuth and shows validation errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays active branch user and provides a logout button when branch-authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading state and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Top notice bar showing link expiration info with a copy-URL action and status feedback.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: React UI for viewing daily totals, selecting days, and displaying revenue and item quantities using data from useDailyTotal.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Hook that loads available days, selects a day, and computes its total revenue and item quantities from stored ledger and summaries.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: LocalStorage-based ledger utilities for storing bill entries, computing daily summaries, and managing per-day revenue.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates a unique bill code using timestamp components and a random suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem type and a predefined list of food items with prices and categories.
Provides currency and number formatting helpers for INR with two decimal places.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Implements label normalization, matching line items by name, and counting quantities for catalog items.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Component for browsing, searching, grouping, and managing predefined catalog items with support for adding, deleting, and image uploads.
Type definitions for catalog component props including item lists and callbacks.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Print-only bill receipt component rendering line items and totals with formatting.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Handles saving, loading, retrieving, and clearing bill records in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, catalog interactions, totals computation, and bill saving to ledger.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines types for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Provides numeric parsing, clamping, and calculation utilities for totals, tax, discounts, and subtotals.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Reads an image file using FileReader and returns a data URL with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: UI page allowing users to configure receipt style, upload a payment scan, and save default bill settings.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Loads and saves default bill formatting settings to localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines available receipt styles and their metadata, including the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook to load, save, and optionally sync bill format defaults with a backend user profile.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: Syncs bill print location from backend user profile to local defaults when authenticated.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill, triggers automated printing, handles completion flow, and provides manual print fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: Provides simple branch-level username/password auth with localStorage persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Offers a hook to copy the current page URL using Clipboard API with fallback and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login/logout state management using Dfinity AuthClient and provides identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a query hook to fetch the caller's user profile once an actor is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and print-specific rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, InternetIdentityProvider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting an item.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Represents project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature requests.
